00054 //=============================================================================
00062 class OSIMSIMULATION_API AbstractWrapObject : public Object
00063 {
00064 
00065 //=============================================================================
00066 // DATA
00067 //=============================================================================
00068 public:
00069     enum WrapQuadrant
00070     {
00071         allQuadrants,
00072         negativeX,
00073         positiveX,
00074         negativeY,
00075         positiveY,
00076         negativeZ,
00077         positiveZ
00078     };
00079 
00080     enum WrapAction
00081     {
00082         noWrap,          // the muscle line did not intersect the wrap object
00083         insideRadius,    // one or both muscle points are inside the wrap object
00084         wrapped,         // successful wrap, but may not be 'best' path
00085         mandatoryWrap    // successful wrap that must be used (e.g., both tangent
00086     };                  // points are on the constrained side of the wrap object)
00087 
00088 protected:
00089 
00090     PropertyDblArray _xyzBodyRotationProp;
00091     Array<double>& _xyzBodyRotation;
00092 
00093     PropertyDblVec3 _translationProp;
00094     SimTK::Vec3 & _translation;
00095 
00096     PropertyBool _activeProp;
00097     bool& _active;
00098 
00099     PropertyStr _quadrantNameProp;
00100     std::string& _quadrantName;
00101 
00102     // Support for Display
00103     PropertyObj _displayerProp;
00104     VisibleObject &_displayer;
00105 
00106     WrapQuadrant _quadrant;
00107     int _wrapAxis;
00108     int _wrapSign;
00109 
00110     AbstractBody* _body;
00111 
00112     Transform _pose;
00113     Transform _inversePose;
00114

00117 //=============================================================================

00128 #endif

00131     virtual void scale(const SimTK::Vec3& aScaleFactors) = 0;
00132     virtual void setup(AbstractDynamicsEngine* aEngine, AbstractBody* aBody);
00133 
00134     AbstractBody* getBody() const { return _body; }
00135     const double* getXYZBodyRotation() const { return &_xyzBodyRotation[0]; }
00136     const double* getTranslation() const { return &_translation[0]; }
00137     bool getActive() const { return _active; }
00138     bool getActiveUseDefault() const { return _activeProp.getUseDefault(); }
00139     const char* getQuadrantName() const { return _quadrantName.c_str(); }

00143     virtual std::string getDimensionsString() const { return ""; } // TODO: total SIMM hack!
00144     int wrapMuscleSegment(MusclePoint& aPoint1, MusclePoint& aPoint2,
00145         const MuscleWrap& aMuscleWrap, WrapResult& aWrapResult) const;
00146     virtual int wrapLine(SimTK::Vec3& aPoint1, SimTK::Vec3& aPoint2,
00147         const MuscleWrap& aMuscleWrap, WrapResult& aWrapResult, bool& aFlag) const = 0;
00148 
00149     // Visible Object Support
00150     virtual VisibleObject* getDisplayer() const { return &_displayer; };
00151     virtual void updateGeometry() {};
